      • send

        public TxHash send(AccountAddress sender,
                   AccountAddress recipient,
                   Aer amount)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionOperation
        Send transaction. This method automatically fill nonce, sign and commit in a server. This method is valid only if sender is stored in a server key store. Make sure that sender is unlocked.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
